headline: Valmet to deliver advanced process analytical solutions to Dow's Path2Zero project, supporting net-zero emissions goals for ethylene cracking
summary: Valmet has received orders from Dow – a global materials science leader – to supply turnkey process analytical solutions for its Path2Zero project at its Fort Saskatchewan site in Alberta, Canada. The Fort Saskatchewan Path2Zero (P2Z) project aims to create the world's first net-zero Scope 1 and 2 emissions integrated ethylene cracker and derivatives complex, setting a new benchmark for the industry.
